name: 盧大平
objective:
This course focuses on providing students with knowledge of how modern information technology can help enterprise to 1) improve its efficiency and streamline its business processes. 2) enhance collaboration with its business partners, and 3) gain strategic advantages in the highly competitive business environment. This course will cover 3 major areas of electronic management systems: 1) Functional management systems 2) Enterprise management systems – ERP and customer relationship management system, and 3) Inter-enterprise management systems – supply chain management system 

本課程介紹電子化管理如何使企業能1)強化企業效率並簡化企業流程；2) 強化與企業夥伴之合作效率；及3)爭取企業之策略競爭優勢。本課程介紹下面3種類型之e化管理系統：1)功能性e化管理系統；2) 企業整合e化管理系統 - 企業資源規劃及客戶關係管理系統；及3)跨企業整合e化管理系統 - 供應鏈管理系統。
schedule:
1.Introduction and why use electronic management systems
2.Foundations of electronic management
3.Advances of modern information technologies for management
4.Strategic usage of modern information technologies
5.Foundations of functional management systems
6.Functional management systems: Accounting and Finance systems
7.Functional management systems: Operation support information systems
8.Functional management systems: Marketing and Human Resource management systems
9.Functional system integration
10.Midterm Exam or Project
11.Foundations of enterprise level management systems
12.System integration
13.ERP
14.Supply chain management system
15.Customer relationship management
16.Strategic advantages of inter-enterprise management systems
17.Project presentation and journal paper discussion
18.Final Project
